parameters.name: AlreadyJoined
parameters.description: Specifies whether the current user has joined the workspace.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The region in which the bucket is located.

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The search keyword. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description:
The virtual private cloud (VPC) ID.

> This parameter cannot be used as a filter.
